attributes.action: Make all necessary ammendments to legislation regarding Foxhunting to close loopholes which permit the killing of the fox
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/stopfoxhunts/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
